ns0:simpleDc.ns2:title: Carbon Dynamics in Boreal Forest and Tundra Soils, Alaska - CO2 and CH4 Emissions -
ns0:simpleDc.ns2:subject: CO2
CH4
tundra
carbon
Alaska

ns0:dcTerms.ns2:abstract: CONCLUSIONS 1) Different production processes of CO2 and CH4 from manipulated Arctic coastal tundra, 2) CO2 emission in drained section from ecosystem respiration, 3) CH4 production in the inundated section from metanogenesis, 4) Expansion of tundra lakes, implying enhanced CH4 release, and 5)Disappearance of lakes, connected to stimulated CO2 emission in the Arctic.
